title: Terminal Renderer: Source Code Snippets with Context
body:
Enhance the terminal diagnostic renderer to include high-quality source code snippets.

**Deliverables:**
- `renderSnippet(span: SourceSpan)` helper
- Include line numbers on the left
- Highlight the exact span with carets `^` or underlining
- Show context lines (1-2 lines before and after the affected line)
- Support multi-line spans correctly
- Use ANSI colors for severity and highlights (leveraging a dedicated `color.zig` or similar)

**Design notes:**
- Efficiency is important: don't re-read the whole file for every diagnostic; use a file buffer cache if needed.
- Must handle tab expansion or at least be consistent with how the lexer tracks columns.
